Popover

A popover is a new, usually smaller window that appears above other content onscreen. Use a popover to give additional information to the user or to ask for user interaction. You can close a popover by clicking outside the popover window, or by clicking the same icon that opens the popover.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-popover

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-popover

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-popover/src/scss/popover";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Popover } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-popover';
  • vl-popover--align-left: to align the popover with the left side of your container
  • vl-popover--align-center: to align the popover with the center of your container
  • vl-popover--align-right: to align the popover with the right side of your container
  • vl-popover--closable: to add a Close button to your container
  • vl-popover__link-list--bordered: apply this modifier to .vl-popover__link-list to add a border to the link list
  • <li role="none" class="vl-popover__link-list__separator"></li>: to add a separator between the items in the link list

Popover (left aligned)

vl-popover--align-left: to align the popover with the left side of your container

  • link item 01
  • link item 02
  • Uitloggen
      <div class="vl-popover  vl-popover--align-left" data-vl-popover>
  <button class="js-vl-popover__toggle vl-popover__toggle" type="button" aria-expanded="false">
    Open popover
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-u-badge vl-vi-u-badge--grey vl-vi-u-badge--small vl-vi-arrow vl-vi-u-90deg" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </button>
<div class="vl-popover__content" >
  <ul class="vl-popover__link-list">
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">link item 01</a></li>
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">link item 02</a></li>
    <li role="none" class="vl-popover__link-list__separator"></li>
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">Uitloggen</a></li>
  </ul>
      <button class="vl-popover__close-btn vl-vi vl-vi-cross" tabindex="0">
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Close popover</span>
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>

Popover center (center aligned)

vl-popover--align-center: to align the popover with the center of your container

  • link item 02
  • Uitloggen

    <li role="none" class="vl-popover__link-list__separator"></li>

  </ul>

Popover closable (left aligned)

vl-popover--closable: to add a Close button to the popover

  • link item 01
  • link item 02
  • Uitloggen
      <div class="vl-popover  vl-popover--closable" data-vl-popover>
  <button class="js-vl-popover__toggle vl-popover__toggle" type="button" aria-expanded="false">
    Open popover
    <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-u-badge vl-vi-u-badge--grey vl-vi-u-badge--small vl-vi-arrow vl-vi-u-90deg" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </button>
<div class="vl-popover__content" >
  <ul class="vl-popover__link-list">
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">link item 01</a></li>
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">link item 02</a></li>
    <li role="none" class="vl-popover__link-list__separator"></li>
    <li class="vl-popover__link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">Uitloggen</a></li>
  </ul>
      <button class="vl-popover__close-btn vl-vi vl-vi-cross" tabindex="0">
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Close popover</span>
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>
